definition: to assist in managing (e.g. traffic police or crowd control)/to steward
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Traffic wardens are responsible for enforcing the law relating to the illegal parking.
sentences.chinese: 交通协管员有责任协助执行非法停车的相关法规。
